title: Approve a Contractor Submittal
description: A contractor has submitted a document for approval (e.g., a safety plan or a technical procedure). A project engineer must review and approve it.

tasks.description: Open the submittal from the 'Pending Review' queue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the contractor's submitted document.

tasks.description: Review the document to ensure it meets all project requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer confirms the submitted safety plan is compliant.

tasks.description: Mark the submittal as 'Approved' in the system, which notifies the contractor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent approves the document, and the contractor is notified that they can proceed.
